name: The Circle Tales: Elvenwoods
description:
Elvenwoods is a story-driven action-adventure game, and the first instalment of the Dark Aeon saga. It is an experimental project made to learn game development, and is now available for everyone on Steam. It will therefore remain completely free.

In the beginning, there was a Source. This Source was the origin of every universe, and the only thing that prevented time and space to collapse. In the year 5000 of the Creation Era, the high priest of the Dead God Tarisdum destroyed the Source, starting a ten-thousand-year prophecy. Its first events take place in Vàlochlin, a young world built by the Warlord Dusnol to hide the skull of the Dead God. You are Imriel of Darkwood, Green Spirit of the Circle, an elf who dreams of exploring the world. After arriving in the Elvenwoods, you begin a quest to slay a resurrected Tarisdum, and to uncover the mystery of the Three Enemies.


The beginning of a saga
A 10-hour long, fully voiced story.
Elvenwoods is a story-driven game, based on a main questline and seven factions.

Epic battles
A dynamic sword, bow, and magic combat system.
18 unique boss battles await the players, as well as a trials mode for those who seek a true challenge.

A vast open world
The world of Elvenwoods expands on three different maps and more than a hundred locations to explore.
Players can travel by foot, on a mount, on a boat, or even by flying.
